Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Houston in 2007...
Traded from Houston to Milwaukee on 4/15/2009 (Going to MIL: SS E. Bonifacio, 3B B. Lawrie, RF A. Fuentes, C M. Ojeda, P D. Bautista. Going to HOU: C V. Martinez, P C. Young)...
Injured on 5/2/2009 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 4/8/2010, off Kelvim Escobar (STL)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Pittsburgh on 4/17/2010...
Hit first career homerun on 6/16/2010, off Bill Wright (CIN)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 2013...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/2014, hitting .381 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against New York (N) on 8/29/2014...
Traded from Milwaukee to Kansas City on 2/4/2018 (Going to MIL: P T. Faucher, P J. Boudreaux, SS L. Parnell, CF S. Robinson. Going to KCA: RF E. Bonifacio, P T. Santucci, P R. Sanders)...
Drove in 6 runs against Tampa Bay on 6/19/2019...
Hit for the cycle against Minnesota on 8/5/2019...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2020, hitting .426 with 7 HR, 28 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/23/2021, hitting .367 with 4 HR, 15 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 7 RBI against Cleveland on 8/25/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Arizona on 2/26/2022 to a 2-year deal worth $2,225,000 per year...
